ResearchProjectDef.label: basic vehicles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct basic, inefficient vehicles, from prowler buggy to roadkill single-person tanks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: complex vehicles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct complex vehicles, such as wagons, roadrunners and snatchers, using the components you can easily fabricate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: aerial vehicles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct vehicles capable of travelling above the ground, such as a mosquito helicopter and a smuggler cargo airplane.

ResearchProjectDef.label: combat vehicles
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct complex combat vehicles, such as bulldog battle tanks, tango armored personnel carriers and warbird combat airplanes.
